author: Noah Higgins-Dunn
title: Confirmed coronavirus cases in the US passes 500,000, according to Johns Hopkins University
description: New York state is the epicenter of the outbreak in the country and has reported more cases than Italy, Spain, France and Germany.
content:
The coronavirus has now infected over 500,000 people in the U.S. as of 9:25 p.m. Eastern Time Friday, constituting almost one-third of all cases across the globe, according to data from Johns Hopkins University. 
The virus, which emerged in Wuhan, China, in … [+1204 chars]
